001package com.github.sormuras.bach.external;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.ExternalModuleLocator;
004
005/** Locates "Jackson" modules via their Maven Central artifacts. */
006public record Jackson(String version) implements ExternalModuleLocator {
007
008  private static final String MODULE_PREFIX = "com.fasterxml.jackson";
009  private static final String MAVEN_GROUP = "com.fasterxml.jackson";
010
011  /**
012   * Constructs a new Jackson module locator with the given version.
013   *
014   * @param version the Jackson version
015   */
016  public static Jackson version(String version) {
017    return new Jackson(version);
018  }
019
020  @Override
021  public String caption() {
022    return "com.fasterxml.jackson.[*] -> Jackson " + version;
023  }
024
025  @Override
026  public String locate(String module) {
027    if (!module.startsWith(MODULE_PREFIX)) return null;
028    var group =
029        switch (module) {
030          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation",
031              "com.fasterxml.jackson.core",
032              "com.fasterxml.jackson.databind" -> "com.fasterxml.jackson.core";
033          default -> MAVEN_GROUP;
034        };
035    var artifact =
036        switch (module) {
037          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation" -> "jackson-annotations";
038          default -> module.substring(14).replace('.', '-');
039        };
040    return Maven.central(group, artifact, version);
041  }
042}
